Initializer# init(selection:pickerContent:confirmation:)

StoreKitSwiftUIiOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+macOS 15.0+visionOS 2.0+watchOS 11.0+

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
init(
    selection: Binding<SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration.Option?>,
    @ViewBuilder pickerContent: () -> PickerContent,
    @ViewBuilder confirmation: @escaping (SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration.Option) -> ConfirmationContent
)
```

Available when `PickerContent` conforms to `View` and `ConfirmationContent` conforms to `View`.## [See Also](/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStorePicker/init(selection:pickerContent:confirmation:)#see-also)
